CustomField.formula: IF(!ISBLANK(End_DateTime__c), IF( FLOOR((End_DateTime__c - (CreatedDate))) > 0, TEXT( 1 * FLOOR( ( End_DateTime__c - ( CreatedDate ) ) ) ) & " days ", IF( FLOOR( MOD( ( End_DateTime__c - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 ,24 ) ) > 0, TEXT( 1 * FLOOR( MOD( ( End_DateTime__c - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( 1 * ROUND( MOD( ( End_DateTime__c - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes ", TEXT( 1 * ROUND( MOD( ( End_DateTime__c - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes ")) , IF( FLOOR((NOW() - (CreatedDate))) > 0, TEXT( 1 * FLOOR( ( NOW() - ( CreatedDate ) ) ) ) & " days ", IF( FLOOR( MOD( ( NOW() - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 ,24 ) ) > 0, TEXT( 1 * FLOOR( MOD( ( NOW() - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( 1 * ROUND( MOD( ( NOW() - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes ", TEXT( 1 * ROUND( MOD( ( NOW() - ( CreatedDate ) ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes ")))
CustomField.label: Interval
